axeman.name: Axeman
axeman.msg: You are an Axeman now. You will be able to easily kill wild animals

herbalist.name: Herbalist
herbalist.msg: You are a Herbalist now. Teas not just quench your thirst but also heal you

bullAttack: You cannot kill a Bull with your hands
rottenFood: Eating rotten food may harm you
cleanFloor: Cleaning the area will keep some animals away
noBaitMsg: Seems like you are missing the bait
thirstDeath: You are about to die of thirst, drink something!
waterHarm: Water straight from the river will quench your thirst but may harm you
wildBull: A wild bull has just appeared
wildChicken: A hungry chicken just appeared and ate your bread crumbs
wonParagraph: You already did all the possible combinations!
lostParagraph: Next time you should pay more attention to your Health and Thirst!

howToPlay.title: How to play
howToPlay.line1: Combine & Survive is a strategy game
howToPlay.line2: The goal is to reach the greatest number of discoveries by dragging and dropping cards
howToPlay.line3: • Only 2 cards can be combined at a time in this edition
howToPlay.line4: • Some cards can be combined with themselves

game.gameInProgress: Looks like you have a game in progress. Would you like to continue playing?
game.autoSave: Your progress will be automatically saved

combinationSuggestionModal.title: Looks like you are stuck
combinationSuggestionModal.line1: Click on Reveal button to see a possible combination

accessToCave: Now that you have Torch you can access the Cave to get new resources. Make sure you are properly equipped since it is very dangerous
caveDanger: You cannot access the Cave like this. It is too dangerous. You need a weapon and clothes
